page.para: It is sev/en days un/til Krish/na’s birth/day. That is a whole week!
Mum tells Krish/na that his birth/day pres/ent is a big sur/prise. Krish/na won/ders what it will be.
On Mon/day Krishna won/ders if he will get gi/ant wings. Then he can fly high in the sky!
On Tues/day Krish/na won/ders if he will get a cake as big as a house!
On Wednes/day Krishna won/ders if he will get a rock/et to go to the moon!
On Thurs/day Krish/na hopes he will get flip/pers, so he can swim with the fish!
On Fri/day Krishna hopes he will get mag/ic foot/ball boots, and score lots of goals!
On Sat/ur/day Krish/na hopes he will get a box full of treas/ure!
On Sun/day it is Krish/na’s birth/day. It is time for his birth/day sur/prise!
It is the best pres/ent ev/er! Krish/na’s broth/er is home from the cit/y to wish him hap/py birth/day.
